channel.title: Self-Talk on Paris Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Self-Talk on Paris Personal Blog

item.title: Voices in My Head
item.description: We all have voices in our head. Yes, even if you think you don’t - you still do. This is not the sixth sense type of voice coming from a ghost.

item.title: Why can't I just DO it?
item.description: I’ve been coaching and training for more than 10 years now.
